nodes.text: Bravo Flight B was a flight within Bravo Squadron, a squadron of N-1 starfighters of the Naboo Royal Space Fighter Corps from the planet Naboo. During the Invasion of Naboo in 32 BBY, Bravo Squadron attacked the Trade Federation's Droid Control Ship. Bravo Leader Ric Olié ordered Flight B to attack the Droid Control Ship's transmitter. After the young pilot Anakin Skywalker inadvertently joined the battle and destroyed the Droid Control Ship, Bravo Squadron was victorious.

As part of Bravo Squadron, Bravo Flight B first appeared 1999 with the release of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and its tie-ins. It received its designation in the Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace 4.
